# 2015 Turkish Basketball Presidential Cup

| stadium                = Yaşar Doğu Sports Hall

The 2015 Turkish Basketball Presidential Cup () was the 31st edition of the Turkish Basketball Presidential Cup. The game was played on 7 October 2015 at Yaşar Doğu Sports Hall between Pınar Karşıyaka, champions of the 2014–15 Turkish Basketball League, and Anadolu Efes, winners of the 2014–15 Turkish Basketball Cup.
Anadolu Efes won the game 76-74 for their 10th title.
